name: Vintage Mens Silk Brocade Shawl Collar Burgundy Dress Waistcoat
description:
Stunning vintage evening dress waistcoat for the Titanic Era, the upcoming trend in fashion.

This beautiful burgundy wine red oriental silk brocade vest is:

36" Chest
34" waist.
Rounded shawl collar
U-shaped low front
4 silk covered buttons
Adjustable back strap

The label is Ori-Dono Kyoto Japan, which were famous for their fine silks.
The style is Edwardian but I don't know whether it is actually from that era or from the later 50s Teddy Boy look.

Either way it would make for a fab' Steampunk evening dress, or delight any Dandy as he dresses to impress.
